# ASAuthorizationWebBrowserSecurityKeyPublicKeyCredentialProvider

**Protocol**

A protocol for creating passkey requests.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol ASAuthorizationWebBrowserSecurityKeyPublicKeyCredentialProvider
```

## Creating credential assertion requests

- **createCredentialAssertionRequest(clientData:)**: Creates a credential assertion request for authenticating to the relying party.
- **createCredentialRegistrationRequest(clientData:displayName:name:userID:)**: Creates a credential registration request for registering a new password with the relying party.

## Conforming Types

- ASAuthorizationSecurityKeyPublicKeyCredentialProvider

items.description: Creates a credential assertion request for authenticating to the relying party.
items.name: createCredentialAssertionRequest(clientData:)

items.description: Creates a credential registration request for registering a new password with the relying party.
